localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Bootcamp grads, self-taught techies, a pianist, comic book artist, and everything in between. Celebrating the wins, revealing the struggles, and sharing the learnings on how they landed their first roles in software engineering, design, & product management.
nodes.title: You Belong In Tech - V1 - 15+ untold stories of non-traditional paths into tech
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: This 7-day email course will cover things from discovering your positioning, to creating a circle of people around you, to building relationships with human psychology. It is 1 email/day, featuring real-life examples and actionable actions each day.
nodes.title: Making Twitter Friends - A free email course to build genuine relationships.
nodes.author: Kevon Cheung

nodes.excerpt: What if you were paid to learn a skill? UniU is a newsletter that incentivises ambitious people to learn a new skill & apply what they're learning by offering crypto bounties for completing learning tasks. Information is nice, action changes everything.
nodes.title: UniU - A newsletter that pays you to learn future skills
nodes.author: Tim Hatherley-Greene

nodes.excerpt: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
nodes.title: Duolingo Roll - Turn your bathroom into a classroom
nodes.author: Jack Morgan

nodes.excerpt: An online community where your degree doesnâ€™t stand between you and your next position. We help self-taught developers and Bootcamp graduates build a network and find opportunities.

nodes.title: Better Year App - Make 2021 a better year: personal advice, goals & meditation
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.
nodes.title: QuestBook - The fastest way to teach and learn
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Moonshot Library is a curated collection of resources to grow, execute, and lead in a zero-to-one startup.
nodes.title: Moonshot Library - Productivity resources for early stage teams

nodes.excerpt: Most live video products are built for an adult-first corporate world not for kids and learning. Prisma LIVE is a new, fun and engaging way for kids to learn and collaborate together virtually.
nodes.title: Prisma LIVE - A live learning platform purpose-built for kids
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: SaaS Competition is increasing rapidly. The more competition a company faces, the harder it is to get clients. If you donâ€™t have strong positioning on the market, use this worksheet to create unique positioning. The Worksheet is FREE until 25th March.
nodes.title: SaaS Positioning Worksheet - Worksheet to create $1M SaaS positioning
nodes.author: Anton Cherkasov

nodes.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
nodes.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals
nodes.author: Todd Soulas

nodes.excerpt: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.
nodes.title: Tuti - Create beautiful online presentations and flashcards
nodes.author: Rukshan

nodes.excerpt: https://productlessons.xyz/ covers real examples and stories of career strategy, interview prep, analytics & more. Level up in 5 minutes a week. Join 5000+ happy readers for free!

nodes.title: Notion Student Pack - Organise your school life inside Notion

nodes.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
nodes.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
nodes.title: Homeroom - Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech
